long_description: Spectacular in its simplicity, the Momentum Base layer watch lives for a single purpose: to keep you on schedule with a classic, accurate and rugged timepiece on your wrist. Analog dial with luminous hands and markers features accurate, Japanese quartz movement. Brushed satin stainless-steel case and screw-down crown are water resistant to 200m (660 ft.). The Momentum Base Layer watch features a heat-tempered, anti-glare and scratch-resistant mineral crystal. Nylon webbing band is breathable and durable.
short_description: Spectacular in its simplicity, the Momentum Base layer watch lives for a single purpose: to keep you on schedule with a classic, accurate and rugged timepiece on your wrist.
